P

Place - Class in cli
Class Place used to place the players ships on the board after the configuration of a new game and before playing
Place(Scanner, Random) - Constructor for class cli.Place
Instantiates a new Place
placePlayerShips(Scanner, String, int) - Method in class cli.Place
Manually places a players ships on the board
placeShipBoard(int, int) - Method in class logic.Game
Places a given player's ship on the board
placeShipBoard(int) - Method in class logic.Player
Places a player's ship on the board
placeShips(Scanner, Random) - Method in class cli.Place
Chooses type of placement for each players ships
placeShipsBoard() - Method in class logic.Player
Places all the ships in the board
Play - Class in cli
Class Play used to play the game after it has been configured or loaded
Play(Scanner) - Constructor for class cli.Play
Instantiates a new play
Player - Class in logic
Class Player contains all the information of a game player
Player(int, String) - Constructor for class logic.Player
Instantiates a new Player
player1 - Variable in class logic.Game
player 1 - always human
player1File - Variable in class logic.Game
path to the save file of player 1, where all relevant player info is stored
player2 - Variable in class logic.Game
player 2 - may be human or not
player2File - Variable in class logic.Game
path to the save file of player 1, where all relevant player info is stored
playerTurn(Player, Player, Scanner) - Method in class cli.Play
Plays a given players turn
Position - Class in logic
Class Position contains the line and the column of the position in the board
Position(int, int) - Constructor for class logic.Position
Instantiates a new Position
position - Variable in class logic.Ship
position of the first cell of the ship
printAttackResult(Player, Player, Position, String, Scanner) - Method in class cli.Play
After an attack, prints the result in the console
printPlayer(int) - Method in class logic.Game
Prints the player with the given number
printPlayer(Player, Player) - Method in class logic.Game
Prints a given player as well as the opponents board as viewed by the player
printShip(int, int) - Method in class logic.Game
Prints the symbol, name and size of a given ship
printShip(Player, int) - Method in class logic.Game
Prints the symbol, name and size of a given ship
